name: heirloom
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a valuable object that has been given by older members of a family to younger members of the same family over many years: This ring is a family heirloom.
a fruit, plant, or seed of a type that has existed for many years: Some experts consider seeds heirlooms only if they were introduced prior to World War II.
